name: Item Balance (Simple)
query:
select a.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
	  a.item_name as "Item Name::150",
	  b.model as "Modele::120",
	  a.manufacturer as "Fabricant::120",
	  a.manufacturer_part_no as "Ref::120",
	  a.description as "Description::150",
	  b.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:120",
	  b.projected_qty as "Projected Qty:Float:140"
 from `tabItem` a left join `tabBin` b
 ON a.item_code = b.item_code 
 where  b.projected_qty = 0 and a.is_purchase_item=1
